column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////As far as parking
column2: they have complimentary valet. The only downside is the service of the valet drivers. He basically begged us for a tip before we could even reach in our purses to grab it. With his hand out
column3: he said "I'm tired. I've been working all day and we work off of tips." If he would've actually given me a chance before making that comment
column4: I would've tipped more but that turned me off.
